attributes.action: Make the elections start in August 5th 2025
attributes.additional_details: So people can vote who can be the prime minister and replace keir
attributes.background: Hey goverment, i would like to make the elections who will be the prime minister start in that date i stated should be

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
